review: LOVE LOVE LOVE the fire stick! It works great!! Easy to browse programs and love how I can be using one input on my tv and just hit the fire stick remote and it will switch to that input instead of me switching with one remote and then switching to that one. It has a great variety of shows and movies to choose from. Also, shipping was very fast even though I chose no rush. Very satisfied with this purchase!
author: Jessmd

review: What Chromecast needs to evolve into. Great product!
author: Brianne M. Jackson

review: I bought this for my parents. It works perfect, it is really easy to use, and the quality of the videos are just great. However, due that we don't live in USA, it is not possible for us to watch Amazon prime instant video, or other apps, more than netflix.
author: Andrés V.

review: Still trying to figure it all out
author: Linda West

review: Amazingly easy set up. I am very pleased with this purchase. Does everything I hoped.
author: William A. Schulz "Bill Schulz"
